casebody.data:
POPE, Respondent, v. WILBUR et al., Appellants. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

October 29, 1900.) Action by patherine A. Pope against John A. Wilbur and another. From a judgment for plaintiff, and from an order denying a new trial, defendants appeal. 'Affirmed. Dudley R. Horton, for appellants. Benjamin F. Edsall, for respondent. HASCALL, J.

We think that the proofs and rulings shown by the case do not justify disturbance of the record below. Judgment and order appealed from should be affirmed, with costs.

FITZSIMONS, C. J., and CONLAN, J., concur.
